item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hi guys! This is my first blog post! I created this blog using the hugo theme Blist. It was kind of a slog to get through with configuring everything but it finally works! Unfortunately the background colors on the home page don’t show up in light mode but just imagine it’s light yellow. Now time to learn html/css so I can actually do bloggo stuff!
